arStrings.szText: Oh, thank the gods! Most people don't bother to look up. I-I'm Nizaar.
Huge relief. You expected to die in this gibbet, but now you have a chance to escape your fate.
(cough) D-do you think you might be able to get me down? I don't want to die up here.
Piling on the guilt and playing the pity card a bit. A genuine plea for help though, you're not faking it.
Those spineless thugs fled when you slew Ezmin, including the one with the key. They're probably camped nearby.
A bit of heat and anger at those cowards who imprisoned you.
